tag_list: paperless, paperless-meeeting-minutes, jauher, zaidi, soc, cloud, outsourcing
overview:
Jauher Zaidi is a Chairman and CEO of Moobila. He is a technologist and a successful business man.

He helped started several hi-tech companies. Some of them are:

  1. 2010 Moobila Corporation (www.moobila.com
  2. 2009 Palmchip Technologies (PVT) Limited (www.palmchiptech.com)
  3. 2007 Sunaira (www.sunaira.com)
  4. 2004 Palmchip Pakistan (Pvt) Limited
  5. 2002 Goodsha Software (www.goodsha.com)
  6. 2000 eSilicon (www.esilicon)
  7. 1996 Palmchip Corporation (www.palmchip.com)
  8. 1994 Virtual Resource (Merged with other business)
  9. 1992 California ASIC Technologies (merged with other business)
  10. 1987 American Links (Merged with other business)
  11. 1982 Z-Tron Int’l (Closed down) and
  12. 1978 Zeco (Closed down)

He holds several technology patents and awards. He has been named two times 20 top technology visionary in the world by EETimes. Recently, has was awarded Terman Technology award for his innovation GMinutes for paperless meeting minutes cloud application.

He also invest in new startups. Please contact him at jauher@jauher.com
